name: ProcalcitoninInBloodSerumOrPlasma
title: Procalcitonin in Blood, Serum, or Plasma
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab tests to measure Procalcitonin in blood, serum or plasma.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood, serum, or plasma for Procalcitonin.),(Inclusion Criteria: Procalcitonin lab test using the source of blood, serum, or plasma represented using LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent Procalcitonin as defined in the inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Procalcitonin [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

contains.display: Procalcitonin [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
